- Background music: shuffled 4 songs, 90s each at 0.25 volume
- Fixed gallery modal close button conflict

Features:
- Intro section with SilencingMe.jpeg
- Our Journey: First Dates, Early Days, Adventures, Graduation galleries
- Quiz Time with 5 custom questions
- Music playlists section
- Gifts section with reveal confirmation and full-size image viewing
